title: some minor msgs for jhin
body:
so tahm kench has the line at the bottom of his R and he is.... a fish or something. so i decided that our grand artist deserves some lines 
Q dancing grenades.
_dance my pretties, dance_
W deadly flourish
_the bloom of the rose, is deadliest._
E captive audience 
_i have blossomed from the muck and filth, i am the lotus, i am beauty._

R curtain call
_your final moment awaits you_
